name: Their Dream
description:
A Psychological Horror Dreamscape

Their Dream is a short horror experience built on trying to make you feel uncomfortable, with a sense of paranoia and danger lurking merely a few steps away. With a wisp of wonder and fear on what you will find as no playthrough will ever be the same. Thus it is highly recommended you play through more then once. The game will start as if your falling asleep, you're mind beginning to relax, falling into a deep slumber till you're thoughts begin to bloom and wander. Forming countless possibilities and ideas- But with everyone, day soon arrives and those thoughts become distorted as your mind slowly awakes till eventually. 

You're dream fades away.

Except you may never awake.

The game is heavily inspired by a dream from one of my friends with a little added on-top to give it more of a gameplay loop. Developed in just over a week. Me, and those who helped both inspire and develop this idea hope you enjoy the experience.
